AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States: country of citizenship and jurisdiction where the case is being heard
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Mexico: country of origin and citizenship of Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Brownsville, Texas: location from which Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa was previously removed
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Laredo, Texas: location of illegal entry into the United States near the Rio Grande, where the defendant has family and location of the division of the United States District Court
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Judge: judge with authority to accept guilty pleas and presiding over the case
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Magistrate Judge: judge presiding over the rearraignment hearing and recommending the district court to accept the guilty plea
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: court with jurisdiction over the case, responsible for determining the sentence based on sentencing guidelines
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Sentencing Guidelines: guidelines referenced in the context of Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's case for determining sentence
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Amendment 740 of the United States Sente: amendment related to cultural assimilation, effective prior to Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's sentencing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Amendment 742 of the United States Sente: amendment eliminating recency points, effective November 1, 2010
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Fifth Circuit: court that has held that a court may consider a defendant's cultural assimilation
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.southwestern border of the United States: region where the 'fast track' program was initially established
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Rio Grande: body of water near location of illegal entry into the United States, used by the defendant for crossing
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Nuevo Laredo, Tamaulipas: place where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's father intermittently resided during his childhood
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.San Antonio, Texas: location where defense counsel assisted Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa with his application for derivative citizenship
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Texas: state where Rogelio Valero-De La Rosa's father intermittently resided during his childhood
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Southern District of Texas: jurisdictional region of the United States District Court
